lineWidthFocus.description: Control the width of the line when the component is in focus state.

lineWidthBold.description: The default line width of the outline class components, such as Button, Input, Select, etc.

fontSizeSM.description: Calculated based on the type scale base setting

fontSizeLG.description: Calculated base font * typescale multipler major third

colorTextBase.description: Used to derive the base variable of the text color gradient. In v5, we added a layer of text color derivation algorithm to produce gradient variables of text color gradient. But please do not use this Seed Token directly in the code!

colorTextLightSolid.description: Control the highlight color of text with background color, such as the text in Primary Button components.

colorText.description: Default text color which comply with W3C standards, and this color is also the darkest neutral color.

colorTextSecondary.description: The second level of text color is generally used in scenarios where text color is not emphasized, such as label text, menu text selection state, etc.

colorTextTertiary.description: The third level of text color is generally used for descriptive text, such as form supplementary explanation text, list descriptive text, etc.

colorTextQuaternary.description: The fourth level of text color is the lightest text color, such as form input prompt text, disabled color text, etc.

colorPrimaryHover.description: Hover state under the main color gradient.

colorTextPlaceholder.description: Control the color of placeholder text.

colorTextDisabled.description: Control the color of text in disabled state.

colorTextHeading.description: Control the font color of heading.

colorTextLabel.description: Control the font color of text label.

colorTextDescription.description: Control the font color of text description.

colorIcon.description: Weak action. Such as `allowClear` or Alert close button

colorIconHover.description: Weak action hover color. Such as `allowClear` or Alert close button

colorHighlight.description: Control the color of page element when highlighted.

colorPrimaryTextHover.description: Hover state of text color under the main color gradient.

colorBgBase.description: Used to derive the base variable of the background color gradient. In v5, we added a layer of background color derivation algorithm to produce map token of background color. But PLEASE DO NOT USE this Seed Token directly in the code!

colorFill.description: The darkest fill color is used to distinguish between the second and third level of fill color, and is currently only used in the hover effect of Slider.

colorFillSecondary.description: The second level of fill color can outline the shape of the element more clearly, such as Rate, Skeleton, etc. It can also be used as the Hover state of the third level of fill color, such as Table, etc.

colorFillAlter.description: Control the alternative background color of element.

colorFillContentHover.description: Control the style of background color of content area when mouse hovers over it.

colorFillContent.description: Control the background color of content area.

colorBgMask.description: The background color of the mask, used to cover the content below the mask, Modal, Drawer and other components use this token

colorFillTertiary.description: The third level of fill color is used to outline the shape of the element, such as Slider, Segmented, etc. If there is no emphasis requirement, it is recommended to use the third level of fill color as the default fill color.

colorFillQuaternary.description: The weakest level of fill color is suitable for color blocks that are not easy to attract attention, such as zebra stripes, color blocks that distinguish boundaries, etc.

colorBgContainer.description: Container background color, e.g: default button, input box, etc. Be sure not to confuse this with `colorBgElevated`.

colorBgContainerDisabled.description: Control the background color of container in disabled state.

colorBgTextHover.description: Control the background color of text in hover state.

colorBgTextActive.description: Control the background color of text in active state.

colorBgLayout.description: This color is used for the background color of the overall layout of the page. This token will only be used when it is necessary to be at the B1 visual level in the page. Other usages are wrong.

colorBgElevated.description: Container background color of the popup layer, in dark mode the color value of this token will be a little brighter than `colorBgContainer`. E.g: modal, pop-up, menu, etc.

colorPrimaryActive.description: Dark active state under the main color gradient (pressed action .e.g. button press)

colorBgSpotlight.description: This color is used to draw the user's strong attention to the background color, and is currently only used in the background color of Tooltip.

colorPrimaryBg.description: Light background color of primary color, usually used for weak visual level selection state.

controlItemBgActiveHover.description: Control the background color of control component item when hovering and active.

controlItemBgActiveDisabled.description: Control the background color of control component item when active and disabled.

controlItemBgHover.description: Control the background color of control component item when hovering.

controlItemBgActive.description: Light background color of primary color, usually used for weak visual level selection state.

colorPrimaryBgHover.description: The hover state color corresponding to the light background color of the primary color.

colorSuccessBgHover.description: Light background color of success color, but antd does not use this token currently

colorSuccessBg.description: Light background color of success color, used for Tag and Alert success state background color

colorSuccessHover.description: Hover state color of dark success color

colorSuccessActive.description: Active state color of dark success color

colorErrorBgHover.description: The hover state background color of the error state.

colorErrorHover.description: The hover state of the error color.

colorErrorActive.description: The active state of the error color.

colorWarningBg.description: The background color of the warning state.

colorWarningBgHover.description: The hover state background color of the warning state.

colorWarningHover.description: The hover state of the warning color.

colorWarningActive.description: The active state of the warning color.

colorWarningText.description: The default state of the text in the warning color.

colorInfoBg.description: Light background color of information color.

colorInfoBgHover.description: Hover state of light background color of information color.

colorInfoHover.description: Hover state of dark color of information color.

colorInfoActive.description: Active state of dark color of information color.

colorBorder.description: Default border color, used to separate different elements, such as: form separator, card separator, etc.

colorBorderSecondary.description: Slightly lighter than the default border color, this color is the same as `colorSplit`. Solid color is used.

colorSplit.description: Used as the color of separator, this color is the same as colorBorderSecondary but with transparency.

colorPrimaryBorder.description: The stroke color under the main color gradient, used on the stroke of components such as Slider.

colorPrimaryBorderHover.description: The hover state of the stroke color under the main color gradient, which will be used when the stroke Hover of components such as Slider and Button

colorWarningBorderHover.description: The hover state border color of the warning state.

colorInfoBorderHover.description: Hover state of border color of information color.

colorSuccessBorder.description: Border color of success color, used for Tag and Alert success state border color

colorWarningBorder.description: The border color of the warning state.

colorErrorBorder.description: The border color of the error state.

colorErrorBorderHover.description: The hover state border color of the error state.

colorBorderBg.description: Control the color of background border of element.

colorWarningOutline.description: Control the outline color of input component in warning state.

colorLinkHover.description: Control the color of hyperlink when hovering.

colorLinkActive.description: Control the color of hyperlink when clicked.

controlOutline.description: Control the outline color of input component

controlInteractiveSize.description: Control the interactive size of control component.

dashed.description: Dashed border style of base components

none.description: none border style of base components

colorTextBase.description: Used to derive the base variable of the text color gradient. In v5, we added a layer of text color derivation algorithm to produce gradient variables of text color gradient. But please do not use this Seed Token directly in the code!

colorBgBase.description: Used to derive the base variable of the background color gradient. In v5, we added a layer of background color derivation algorithm to produce map token of background color. But PLEASE DO NOT USE this Seed Token directly in the code!

colorTextBase.description: Used to derive the base variable of the text color gradient. In v5, we added a layer of text color derivation algorithm to produce gradient variables of text color gradient. But please do not use this Seed Token directly in the code!

colorBgBase.description: Used to derive the base variable of the background color gradient. In v5, we added a layer of background color derivation algorithm to produce map token of background color. But PLEASE DO NOT USE this Seed Token directly in the code!

colorBgContainer.description: Container background color, e.g: default button, input box, etc. Be sure not to confuse this with `colorBgElevated`.
